title: How to Make Tofu French Toast

steps.headline: Make the "egg" batter.
steps.description: Combine everything except the butter and bread in a food processor or blender. You'll want to thoroughly liquify everything together.

steps.headline: Heat the butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Dip the bread in the "egg" batter and allow the bread to absorb the mixture.
Cook the bread in the skillet, until browned on both sides.
Serve the dish with fresh fruits or yogurt.

text: Make the "egg" batter. Combine everything except the butter and bread in a food processor or blender. You'll want to thoroughly liquify everything together. Heat the butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.  Dip the bread in the "egg" batter and allow the bread to absorb the mixture.  Cook the bread in the skillet, until browned on both sides.  Serve the dish with fresh fruits or yogurt.
